init.title: Background Polling
init.description:
Configure background polling intervals.
[Documentation: API Consumption]({docs_url})

data_description.scan_interval: Interval for room data (temp, humidity, heating power). IMPORTANT: Dynamically overridden by 'Auto API Quota' when enabled; serves as fallback when calculated budget is exhausted.
data_description.presence_poll_interval: How often to check Home/Away status. Set to a higher value (e.g. 43200s/12h) to save quota.
data_description.slow_poll_interval: How often to sync battery levels, firmware, capabilities and device list. 86400s (24h) is recommended.
data_description.offset_poll_interval: How often to fetch temperature offsets. Costs 1 API call PER VALVE. 0 = disabled.

quota.title: API Quota & Safety
quota.description:
Configure automatic API quota management.
[Documentation: Auto API Quota]({docs_url})

data_description.auto_api_quota_percent: Use X% of FREE daily quota for status polling (0 = disabled). FREE = Limit - Background Reserve (Syncs) - External Activity (Automations, App use beyond buffer). Hybrid strategy: Uses MAX(Daily Budget - Used, Remaining * X%) → System ALWAYS continues polling even when over daily budget.
data_description.throttle_threshold: Reserve N calls for EVERYTHING outside of Hijack's periodic background polling (Automations, Scripts, Manual App use). Polling stops at this floor to ensure your automations never stall. Recommended: 20.
data_description.disable_polling_when_throttled: Stop periodic polling entirely when remaining quota hits the safety buffer.
data_description.refresh_after_resume: Automatically fetch target temperature/state after resume schedule (HVAC AUTO). Required because schedules are managed Tado cloud-side. Costs 1 API call.

schedule.title: Economy Window
schedule.description:
Configure the Reduced Polling profile (e.g. Night Mode).
[Documentation: Economy Window]({docs_url})

data_description.reduced_polling_active: Enable the time-based weighted polling profile.
data_description.reduced_polling_start: Time when the economy window starts (e.g. 22:00).
data_description.reduced_polling_end: Time when the economy window ends (e.g. 07:00).
data_description.reduced_polling_interval: Polling interval during the economy window (e.g. 3600s = 1h). Set to 0 to pause updates.

advanced.title: Advanced & Debug
advanced.description:
Advanced settings and [tado-api-proxy Repository]({proxy_repo_url}).
[Documentation: API Proxy Bypass]({docs_url})

data_description.api_proxy_url: Advanced: Base URL of a local tado-api-proxy instance. Do NOT include /api/v2. See README for details.
data_description.debounce_time: Time window to collect rapid changes before sending to API. Default 5s.
data_description.call_jitter_enabled: Adds random delays before API calls to obfuscate automation patterns. Only effective when using a proxy.
data_description.jitter_percent: Strength of random variation for polls and calls. Default 10% (e.g. 60s -> 54-66s).
data_description.debug_logging: Enable verbose debug logging for troubleshooting. WARNING: This will generate large log files.

resume_all_schedules.description: Remove all manual overlays in all zones and return to Smart Schedule.

turn_off_all_zones.description: Turn off heating in all zones.

boost_all_zones.name: Boost All Zones
boost_all_zones.description: Boost heating in all zones to 25°C.

set_timer.name: Set Timer
set_timer.description: Set a manual overlay with timer duration or auto-return to schedule.

entity_id.name: Entity
entity_id.description: Any zone entity from Tado Hijack.

overlay.name: Overlay Mode
overlay.description: Termination mode: 'manual' (indefinite), 'next_block' (return to next schedule block), or 'presence' (until presence change).

set_timer_all_zones.name: Set Timer for All Zones
set_timer_all_zones.description: Set a manual overlay for all heating and/or AC zones at once.

overlay.name: Overlay Mode
overlay.description: Termination mode: 'manual' (indefinite), 'timer' (with duration), 'next_block' (return to schedule at next time block), or 'presence' (until presence change).

temperature.name: Temperature
temperature.description: Target temperature (will be capped based on zone type).
